files.description: CLI script that scans agent-specific output directories, promotes/copies the best artifacts into a canonical repo-relative outputs/ directory, and generates outputs/index.md and outputs/manifest.json with sha256 hashes.
Library module implementing artifact discovery, selection, copying, hashing, and index/manifest generation for standardized outputs handling.
Documentation describing the canonical outputs/ structure, how artifacts are selected and consolidated, and how to run the consolidation script.

missionDescription: Create a canonical ./outputs/ directory at repo root (repo-relative, not absolute /outputs) and promote/copy the best existing artifacts from agent-specific output paths into it; then generate ./outputs/index.md and ./outputs/manifest.json listing files + sha256 so artifacts stop being fragmented.
missionSuccessCriteria: Complete strategic task identified by Meta-Coordinator or escalated by Strategic Tracker

Deliverables audit shows many files created but they live in agent-specific paths; multiple agents reported /outputs permission issues and redirected to /mnt/data/outputs. Without canonicalization + manifest, work remains unauditable and is repeatedly duplicated.
projectName: canonical ./outputs/ directory at repo root (repo-relative, not absolute /outputs) and promote/copy the best existing artifacts from agent-specific output paths into it; then generate ./outputs/index.md and ./outputs/manifest.json listing files + sha256 so artifacts stop being fragmented.
